articles.author: Clement Tan
articles.title: Japan trade data dims growth prospects as China leads decline in Asia exports - CNBC
articles.description: Exports to Asia plunged almost 37%, while those to China contracted 13.4% in an eighth consecutive monthly decline, underscoring the extent of the slowdown.
articles.content: Japan posted its first monthly decline in exports in more than 2 years, as weaker demand in its biggest trading partners in China and the rest of Asia dimmed prospects for growth in the world's third… [+2372 chars]
